text: Uha tuhanu cana de ghatana ate vadhana de sabadha vica savala karade hana. Kahi devo ki uha haja la'i lokam vasate samam jam tarika (dasana) vale hana ate neki iha nahim ki tusim chata uparom gharam vica a'o balaki neki iha hai ki manukha sajami bane. Ate gharam vica daravazi'am vicom di a'u ate alaha tom daro tam ki tusim safala hovo
